attributes.text:
This widget displays a menu. A dialog menu extends a dialog and contains a list, which provides the user the possibility to select one value. The selected value is identified through selected index.

Example


var model = new qx.data.Array(["item1","item2","item3"]);

var menu = new qx.ui.mobile.dialog.Menu(model);
menu.show();
menu.addListener("changeSelection", function(evt){
   var selectedIndex = evt.getData().index;
   var selectedItem = evt.getData().item;
}, this);

This example creates a menu with several choosable items.
, The choosable items of the menu.
Fired when the selection is changed.
Reacts on blocker tap.
, contains the selected index number.
Hides the menu, fires an event which contains index and data.
Reacts on selection list click.
Creates the selection list. Override this to customize the widget.
value {qx.ui.mobile.list.List} The selection list
Triggers (re-)rendering of menu items.

Returns the (computed) value of the property hideOnBlockerClick.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #hideOnBlockerClick}.
(Computed) value of hideOnBlockerClick.

Returns the (computed) value of the property selectedItemClass.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectedItemClass}.
(Computed) value of selectedItemClass.

Returns the (computed) value of the property unselectedItemClass.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #unselectedItemClass}.
(Computed) value of unselectedItemClass.
Initial value for property hideOnBlockerClick.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property hideOnBlockerClick with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #hideOnBlockerClick}.
the default value
Initial value for property selectedItemClass.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property selectedItemClass with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectedItemClass}.
the default value
Initial value for property unselectedItemClass.

Calls the apply method and dispatches the change event of the property unselectedItemClass with the default value defined by the class developer. This function can only be called from the constructor of a class.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #unselectedItemClass}.
the default value

Check whether the (computed) value of the boolean property hideOnBlockerClick equals true.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #hideOnBlockerClick}.
Whether the property equals true.

Resets the user value of the property hideOnBlockerClick.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #hideOnBlockerClick}.

Resets the user value of the property selectedItemClass.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectedItemClass}.

Resets the user value of the property unselectedItemClass.

The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depeneding on the property configuration and value availability.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #unselectedItemClass}.
New value for property hideOnBlockerClick.

Sets the user value of the property hideOnBlockerClick.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #hideOnBlockerClick}.
The unmodified incoming value.
, the model of choosable items in the menu.
Sets the items in the menu.
, the index of the item which should be pre-selected.
Sets the pre-selected item. Set selectedIndex before model, because changing model triggers rendering of list.
New value for property selectedItemClass.

Sets the user value of the property selectedItemClass.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #selectedItemClass}.
The unmodified incoming value.
New value for property unselectedItemClass.

Sets the user value of the property unselectedItemClass.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #unselectedItemClass}.
The unmodified incoming value.

Toggles the (computed) value of the boolean property hideOnBlockerClick.

For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #hideOnBlockerClick}.
the new value
Indicates whether the menu should disappear when tap/click on blocker.
Class which is assigned to selected items. Useful for re-styling your menu via LESS.
Class which is assigned to unselected items. Useful for re-styling your menu via LESS.
